DevCam continuously records your screen in a rolling 15-minute buffer, allowing you to save clips of recent activity. All recordings are stored locally on your Mac and never uploaded.
DevCam can optionally capture microphone audio along with your screen recording. Audio is stored locally and never uploaded.
DevCam may need to control other apps to provide screen recording functionality.
